Author: IkarosFalling
Text: I'm a big proponent of "frontload the bad, and the good will follow". These next few days are going to be so hard, but if you can push through andput on a few lbs the good will come. The support will come. The recovery will come. You can do it! As hard as it gets, remember that this is the bad... And if you can stick it out, the good is coming to you dear!

Author: whaleterweight
Text: Hey, you can do this. Look at how far you've come and how close you are to the help and resources to get better. I can see that you are trying and working so hard, or else you wouldn't be where you are. This last hurdle might seem more like a high jump, but you can do it!
